title: Breakaway
description: To the outside world Kate Lewis's life seems perfect. She's married to a successful businessman and has a newborn baby girl, but as they say looks can be deceiving. In reality, Kate's life is a living nightmare. Her husband is abusive and controlling. With no one to turn to she's trapped. Then she and her husband move back to their old hometown. It means only one thing to Kate. She'll be reunited with Dr. Nathan Holden, the best friend she hasn't seen in 6 years. When Kate learns a shocking secret about her husband her life will never be the same again. With Nathan's help she finds the courage to break free and to put her life back together again.
author: Kate  Hopkins
